alert.note: Alert for Madison; Morgan (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 18 at 4:12PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Madison, southeastern Limestone and central Morgan Counties through 500 PM CDT... At 412 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Triana, or 10 miles southwest of Redstone Arsenal, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Decatur, Madison, Redstone Arsenal, Priceville, Triana, Huntsville International Airport, Somerville, Mooresville, Valhermoso Springs and Florette. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
